features.title: Cross-Platform
features.description: Play together whether you're on Java Edition or Bedrock Edition. Connect from PC, console, or mobile.

features.title: Grief Protection
features.description: Free land claims for all players. Protect your builds from griefing with our easy-to-use claiming system.

features.title: Family Friendly
features.description: A safe environment for all ages. Clean chat, respectful community, and active moderation.

features.title: Multiple Worlds
features.description: Choose your adventure with 6 unique worlds - from easy survival to challenging hard mode, plus creative worlds.

features.title: Jobs & Economy
features.description: Earn money by mining, farming, building, and more. Join jobs, level up, and trade with other players.

features.title: Invite Only
features.description: A private server for family and friends. Request access to join our welcoming community.
